text: Ðis is ðara V hida boc æt tadmertune de Eadwig cing gebocode Beorhtnoðe ealdermen ece yrfe.
Ðis synt þa landgemæro to tadmertune þara V hida ærest on halhford<../images/tbar.gif>andlang wo burnan<../images/tbar.gif>on eow anwelles stream<../images/tbar.gif>up ongean stream an sandford.
Of sandforda a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ða heafod stoccas.
Of ðan stoccan on ðone mær stan.
Of ðan stane a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on landgares bricge.
